sentences.sentence: We shall encamp tonight at the Fords of Beruna.
sentences.translation: 我们今晚得到柏卢纳浅滩去安营。

sentences.sentence: They had to encamp on the barren hills outside and wait for help to come.
sentences.translation: 他们只好在城外荒山上扎营，等待救援。

sentences.sentence: They are to carry the tabernacle and all its furnishings; they are to take care of it and encamp around it.
sentences.translation: 他们要抬（抬或作搬运）帐幕和其中的器具，并要办理帐幕的事，在帐幕的四围安营。
